title: Polki Diamond Chandbali - Traditional Jhumka Earrings
materials: Uncut Polki Diamonds of varying sizes
features: Intricately designed Chandbali with a central teardrop-shaped Polki diamond. Features a floral top design and a cascading arrangement of smaller Polki diamonds with tear-shaped Polki drops for a classic Jhumka look. Delicate open setting to maximize the brilliance of the Polki diamonds.
description: A timeless piece representing South Indian heritage. The use of uncut Polki diamonds gives it an antique charm and unparalleled sparkle. Handcrafted by skilled artisans, ensuring exceptional quality and durability. The Hyderabadi polish adds a lustrous finish that enhances its beauty. A perfect blend of tradition and elegance.
